document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 15/06/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (15/06/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Rock Band Mini-Sale – Une semaine seulement (se termine le 22/06/11) * Going Country Pack 01 – (Prix initial 6.59 € – maintenant 3.99 €) * Going Country Pack 02 – (Prix initial 8.99 € – maintenant 6.59 €) * Going Country Pack 03 – (Prix initial 7.99 € – maintenant 5.29 €) * Alt Country Pack 01 – (Prix initial – 6.59 € – maintenant 3.99 €) * Johnny Cash Pack 01 – (Prix initial 9.99 € – maintenant 7.99 €) * Roy Orbison Pack 01 (Prix initial 7.99 € – maintenant 5.29 €) Essai et déblocage (PS3) * Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 (8.99 €) – 20% de remise pour les abonnés PlayStation + (à l’exception de l’offre Plus du Welcome Back) Rating: PEGI 7 Jeux complets (PS3) * Midnight Club: Los Angeles Complete Edition (24.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Episodes (PS3) * Back to the Future: Episode 3 (Gratuit pour l’achat de la saison complète) Rating: PEGI 12 Jeux complets (PSP) * WWE All-Stars (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 * LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 minis (PS3 et PSP) * Babel, The King Of The Blocks (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 * The 2D Adventures Of Rotating Octopus Character (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 * Run Ghost Run (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 * Best Of Solitaire (6.19 €) Rating: PEGI 3 * Jellycar 2 (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Classiques PSone (PS3 et PSP) * Tekken (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Démos (PS3) * Ape Escape Rating: PEGI 3 Ajouts de jeu et contenus (PS3) * Alice: Madness Return – Weapons Of Madness And Dresses Pack (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 – Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg * Call of Duty: Black Ops Escalation (13.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 * DanceDanceRevolution: New Moves Rating: PEGI 18 o DDR Konamix Greatest Hits (3.59 €) * DIRT 3 Rating: PEGI 12 o Teams And Cars Unlock Pack (2.99 €) o Power And Glory Car Pack (5.49 €) (contient les items suivants disponibles à l’unité) o BMW M3 Rally (1.49 €) o Chevrolet Camaro Ssx Concept (1.49 €) o Ford Focus St Rallycross (1.49 €) o Lancia Delta S4 (1.49 €) o Scion TC (1.49 €) * Hyperdimension Neptunia Rating: PEGI 12 o 99 € Knights (gratuit) o Apple Beret (Compa) (0.99 €) o Black Kitty (Neptune) (0.99 €) o Bourne Hazard (gratuit) o Level Cap +200 (3) (0.99 €) o Witch Hat (If) (0.99 €) * Marvel Vs Capcom 3 – Shadow Battle 09 (0.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 * MotorStorm Apocalypse Rating: PEGI 16 o Prestige Pack (2.49 €) (contient les items suivants disponibles à l’unité) o Prestige Supercar Custom Pack (0.99 €) o Prestige Rally Car Custom Pack (0.99 €) o Prestige Supercar 2 Custom Pack (0.99 €) * LittleBigPlanet Rating: PEGI 7 o Solstice Costume (gratuit – 1 semaine seulement!) * Rock Band 2 Rating: PEGI 12 – Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg o Lost Soul – Amberian Dawn (1.49 €) o Airbrushed – Anamanaguchi (1.49 €) o You Will Leave A Mark – A Silent Dawn (1.49 €) o Fight For Greatness – Bloom (0.79 €) o Spaghetti Cat – Parry Gripp (0.79 €) * Rock Band 3 Rating: PEGI 12 – Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg o Foo Fighters Pack 04 (5.29 €) (contient les chansons suivantes disponibles à l’unité) o Long Road to Ruin (1.49 €) o Rope (1.49 €) o Stacked Actors (1.49 €) o Walk (1.49 €) o Hard Rock Hallelujah – Lordi (1.49 €) o I Alone – Live (1.49 €) o Lightning Crashes – Live (1.49 €) o Take On Me – A-Ha (1.49 €) o Tubthumping – Chumbawamba (1.49 €) o Unholy Confessions – Avenged Sevenfold (1.49 €) o Welcome To The Family – Avenged Sevenfold (1.49 €) o King Of Rock – Run-DMC (1.49 €) * SOCOM Special Forces – Pro Assault Pack (gratuit) (Pour utiliser ce pack vous aurez besoin de SOCOM: Special Forces et du pass Pro Access qui est disponible gratuitement sur le Store) Rating: PEGI 16 * Yoostar 2 Rating: PEGI 12 – Disponibilité: non disponible en Belgique o Are You Trying To Seduce Me? (1.75 €) o The Parthenon In Greece (0.75 €) o Fast-Moving Clouds (gratuit) o Atop The Great Wall Of China (0.75 €) o Licoln Memorial (0.75 €) o Buckingham Palace Garden (0.75 €) o One Senior Always Has To Be The Badass (1.75 €) o They Think He’s A Righteous Dude (1.75 €) o Damone’s Dating Advice (1.75 €) o Has The War Started? (1.99 €) o Give ‘em Hell! (1.75 €) o The War Department Promised 180 Men (1.75 €) o Classic Hollywood (6.19 €) o Hollywood Sets Pack (5.49 €) o Hollywood Icons (5.49 €) o Horror (5.49 €) o The Death Of Kirk (1.75 €) o You’re Terminated (1.75 €) Ajouts de jeu et contenus (PSP) * Buzz: TUMQ – Decades Quiz 90′s (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Avatars (PS3) * MotorStorm: Apocalypse o MSA Vehicles Avatar Bundle (0.99 €) (Contient les avatars suivants disponibles à l’unité) – Tous disponibles à 0.25 € o Big Rig Avatar o Rally Car Avatar o Supermini Avatar o Superbike Avatar o Monster Truck Avatar Thèmes dynamiques (PS3) * Armageddon Riders Dynamic Theme (1.99 €) * Leviathan Themes o Black Hole Slot Machine (1.99 €) * Smobile Themes o Dynamic Paradise Theme (2.49 €) * The Studio o Shannon’s Entropy Dynamic Theme by Jonathan Zawada (1.99 €) o Burgerbrained Dynamic Theme by Jon Burgerman (2.99 €) * Disruptive Themes o Destination: Hot Air Balloon (2.49 €) o Purple Haze (1.99 €) * Lama Themes o Racing Theme (1.99 €) o Falling Water Theme (1.99 €) o Fantastic Beach (1.99 €) o Inferno Theme (1.99 €) o Kitten Theme (3.59 €) o Swat Theme (1.99 €) Fond d’écran (PS3) * Armageddon Riders Wallpaper 2 (gratuit) Bande-son (PS3) * Söldner-X & Söldner-X 2 Complete Soundtrack Bundle (7.99 €) Vidéos (PS3) * Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows (Part 2): Play As Your Heroes’ Trailer * Risen 2: Dark Waters Reveal Trailer
En fait c’est surtout la semaine dernière que j’aurai du vous faire part de la mise à jour, car il y a l’excellent Beyond Good & Evil HD qui est sorti, un de mes jeux vidéo préférés sur console ! Désolé pour mon manque de régularité sur le blog, mais promis le rythme va vite reprendre 😉 Bon jeu à tous !
